text.title: Websites Done Uniquely
text.para: Websites By Trevor offers a quality of service that cannot be beat by WordPress nor other local developers. There are a few key differences you will find, the main differences being:

text.title: Subscription Based
text.text: NO SETUP FEE, $250 per month for a 5 page website + maintenance. Affordable packages with no hidden fees. Simple yearly contracts.

text.title: Optimization
text.text: Website speed is our driving force for a quality site. The number one reason visitors will leave your website is if it's too slow.

text.title: Mobile-First Design
text.text: We build all our sites mobile-first because most online traffic is on mobile devices. We also ensure every site is fully responsive.

text.title: User-Friendly
text.text: A simple and easy to use website is a priority, yet sometimes overlooked. All of our sites are easy to navigate and use.
